product_name: Patagonia Maha Slouch Boots - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: After a day spent playing hard on slopes or trails, unwind wearing the women's Patagonia Maha Slouch Boots. They're made of waterproof suede leather and are well cushioned for comfort. Durable, waterproof suede leather uppers and breathable, wicking polyester-mesh linings keep feet dry and comfortable. Pigskin-lined, anatomically curved, 20% recycled EVA footbed and 2mm recycled EVA insoles provide cushioning and comfort. Patagonia(R) Air Cushion Plus offers shock absorption. Recycled rubber soles provide excellent traction. Patagonia Maha Slouch Boots for women feature a medium width and arch support. Closeout.
short_description: After a day spent playing hard on slopes or trails, unwind wearing the women's Patagonia Maha Slouch Boots. They're made of waterproof suede leather and are well cushioned for comfort.
